basic.Peptide Name: Buforin-1 (Buforin I; Fragment of Histone H2A; toads, amphibians, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=4 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=4 µg/ml), Streptococcus mutans (MIC=8 µg/ml), Streptococcus pneumoniae (MIC=4 µg/ml), Pseudomonas putida (MIC=4 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=8 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=4 µg/ml), Serratia sp. (MIC=8 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=4 µg/ml), Cryptococcus neoformans (MIC=4 µg/ml), Saccharomyces cerevisiae (MIC=4 µg/ml).
